block.p: BASEBALL

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Optioned INF Morgan Burkhart to Pawtucket of the International League. Announced option of RHP Jin Ho Cho was transferred from Trenton of the Eastern League to Pawtucket. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Activated LHP Tom Martin from the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of INF Chan Perry from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned LHP Cameron Cairncross and 3B-OF Russell Branyan to Buffalo. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Assigned RHP Roy Halladay to Syracuse of the International League.
BASEBALL

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Optioned INF Morgan Burkhart to Pawtucket of the International League. Announced option of RHP Jin Ho Cho was transferred from Trenton of the Eastern League to Pawtucket. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Activated LHP Tom Martin from the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of INF Chan Perry from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned LHP Cameron Cairncross and 3B-OF Russell Branyan to Buffalo. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Assigned RHP Roy Halladay to Syracuse of the International League.

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Placed C Eddie Taubensee on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to Aug. 1. Purchased the contract of INF Chris Sexton from Louisville of the International League. FLORIDA MARLINS--Agreed to terms with RHP Jack Armstrong on a minor league contract. Sent INF Mendy Lopez outright to Calgary of the PCL. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Activated C Mike Lieberthal from the 15-day disabled list. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Acquired SS Desi Relaford from Philadelphia for a player to be named. Transferred RHP Steve Montgomery from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list.
Pacific Coast League CALGARY CANNONS--Optioned INF Alex Melconian to Portland of the Eastern League.
Atlantic League ATLANTIC CITY SURF--Sold the contract of CF Keith Gordon to the Seattle Mariners.

Frontier League CANTON CROCODILES--Signed OF Jim Essian. Released RHP Pat Frawley. Announced the retirement of OF T.J. Bartosh. DUBOIS COUNTY DRAGONS--Signed RHP Matt Wheeler and RHP Joe Wicklund. Released RHP Brad Boyd. Announced the retirement of RHP Brian Bradley. Placed 3B Chris Smith on the suspended list. EVANSVILLE OTTERS--Announced the retirements of RHP Matt Smith and RHP Matt Silcock. RICHMOND ROOSTERS--Sold the contract of RHP Chad Sosebee to the Boston Red Sox. Signed RHP Trae Clary and OF Tony Vandemore. Released LHP Kory Hartman. RIVER CITY RASCALS--Sold the contacts of OF Mike Robertson and RHP Randy Eversgerd to the Boston Red Sox.

Northern League NL--Announced the New York Yankees have purchased the contract of Waterbury Spirit LHP Mike Bertotti. SCHAUMBURG FLYERS--Announced coach Jack Voigt has signed with Oklahoma of the PCL as a player-coach. Texas-Louisiana League ALEXANDRIA ACES--Signed RHP Brian Berryman. Released RHP Mike Kalchuk.
BASKETBALL

National Basketball Association MIAMI HEAT--Re-signed G-F Bruce Bowen. ORLANDO MAGIC--Re-signed F Monty Williams. SACRAMENTO KINGS--Signed G-F Hidayet Turkoglu to a multiyear contract. International Basketball League BALTIMORE BAYRUNNERS--Announced the resignation of Greg Smith, president.
FOOTBALL
National Football League GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed K Jeff Hall. Waived K David Purnell.
HOCKEY

National Hockey League CAROLINA HURRICANES--Traded RW Sandy McCarthy and a 2001 draft pick to the New York Rangers for C-RW Rob DiMaio and LW Darren Langdon. Agreed to terms with F Martin Gelinas on a two-year contract. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Named Chris Mizer trainer and Mark Casterline strength and conditioning coach. NEW YORK ISLANDERS--Named Ted Van Zelst and Eric Scheibe corporate marketing managers, Joe Schenck director of information technology, Ryan Halkett event operations manager, and Mauricio Acosta creative services manager. PHOENIX COYOTES--Named Paul Henry and Blair Reid to the scouting department. TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Named Keith Acton assistant coach.
East Coast Hockey League SOUTH CAROLINA STINGRAYS--Signed D Ryan Brinkley. TRENTON TITANS--Announced Mike Haviland, assistant coach, will return for the 2000-01 season.
Western Professional Hockey League CENTRAL TEXAS STAMPEDE--Re-signed C Ron Newhook. LUBBOCK COTTON KINGS--Signed D Mike Van Volsen.
United States Hockey League SIOUX CITY MUSKETEERS--Named Fred Harbinson assistant coach.
SOCCER
World Indoor Soccer League MONTERREY LA RAZA--Waived D Jamie Mireles, MF Blademar Martinez and D Max Thomsen.
COLLEGE

ALABAMA--Suspended recruiting coordinator Ronnie Cottrell from off-campus recruiting during the month of May, 2001 for violating NCAA rules by selling four tickets to the 2000 Orange Bowl. APPALACHIAN STATE--Named Geoff Wiswell assistant sports information director. AUBURN--Reinstated freshman WR Deandre Green to the football team. CHRISTOPHER NEWPORT--Promoted Wayne Block to assistant to the athletic director for communications and Francis Tommasino to director of athletic communications. Announced the resignation of Curt Long, baseball coach. DENVER--Named Marla Rodriguez director of media relations. Promoted Kevin Fletcher to associate director of media relations. FRANCIS MARION--Named Elijah Kirkpatrick women's volleyball coach. LE MOYNE--Named Steve Evans men's basketball coach. MCNEESE STATE--Named Mike Robinson strength and conditioning coach, Carlos McGee tight end coach, Ben Beasley football graduate assistant, and Tarius Davis and Pat Matthews football student coaches. UC IRVINE--Named Jason Gill and Pat Shine assistant baseball coaches. WINGATE--Named Wally Moore golf coach, Jason Murphy and Erin Bradbury graduate assistants to golf program. WRIGHT STATE--Named Laurel Wartluft associated athletics director and senior women's administrator, Rod Perry assistant athletics director for academic and support services, Kim Grant marketing director and Sion Brinn men's and women's assistant swimming coach.
